## HttpServer class

HTTP Server implementation using template method pattern 继承BaseServer，只实现HTTP特定的逻辑

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class HttpServer extends BaseServer<HttpServerOptions> 
```
**Extends:** BaseServer&lt;HttpServerOptions&gt;
